error.couldNotUpdateFeeEstimates: Couldn't update fee estimates, they might be outdated
error.couldNotLoadFeeEstimates: Couldn't load fee estimates, cannot continue
error.missingCharacterTypeForPassword: Password needs to have at least 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase and 1 number character
error.passwordMustBeAtLeast8Characters: Password needs to be at least 8 characters
error.errorWhileLoadingTheWallet: An error occurred while loading the wallet
error.couldNotRestoreWallet: Couldn't restore wallet with the provided information
error.textIsLimitedToBytes: The text is limited to {{count}} byte
error.textIsLimitedToBytes_plural: The text is limited to {{count}} bytes

message.progressMightBeOutdated: Your wallet is connecting at the moment, the progress might be outdated.
message.passwordCriteriaMessage: Note: Password needs to be at least 8 characters long and have at least 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase and 1 number
message.inputRecoveryPhraseInstructions: Re-input recovery phrase by selecting words from selection
message.unlockedWalletNeeded: You need an unlocked wallet to continue
message.noTransparentAccounts: You have no transparent accounts. Click on "$t(wallet.button.generateNewAddress)" to generate one.
message.transparentFundsDescription: These funds are transparent and can be visible to other Midnight users, we recommend you move them to a confidential address.
message.howToViewTransparentBalancesInfo: To view your transparent balances, click the Transparent Accounts button below.
message.restoreWalletDescription: Restore wallet using Backup Recovery Phrase or Private Key
message.recoveryPhraseDescription1: This is your wallet backup phrase. It can be entered into any version of Luna Wallet in order to restore your wallet
message.recoveryPhraseDescription2: The phrase is case sensitive. Please, make sure you write down and save your recovery phrase. You will need this phrase to use and restore your wallet
message.recoveryPhraseApproval: Yes, I have written it down.
message.securityRecoveryPhraseDescription: On the following Screen you will see a 12 Word Phrase. This is your wallet backup phrase. It can be entered in any version of Luna in order to restore your wallet.
message.showPrivateKeyDescription: Please, make sure your screen is not visible to anyone but you to ensure security
message.checkboxFinishingWalletCreationDescripti: I understand that my wallet and tokens are held securely on this device only and not on any servers
I understand that if this application is moved to another device or is deleted, my wallet can only be recovered with the backup phrase I have written down and stored securely
message.exportPrivateKey: Enter your password to export your private key.
message.lockWalletDescription: Enter your password to lock your wallet. You can access your wallet later by unlocking it with your password.
message.removeWalletInstruction: Enter your password to remove your wallet.
message.removeWalletApproval1: I understand that I won't be able to restore this wallet and access my funds if I didn't save my private key or seed phrase.
message.removeWalletApproval2: I understand that all of my wallet data will be deleted from this machine.
message.transparentAddressWarning: Warning: By using a transparent address your transaction will not stay confidential.
message.applyConfidentialityDescription: This transaction will move selected funds to your confidential address which will remove their visibility from the Midnight Blockchain.
message.transparentTransactionWarning: Warning: I understand that the funds included in this transaction will no longer be confidential.
message.transparentAddressNeeded: You need a transparent address to continue
message.generatedYourFirstTransparentAddress: We generated your first transparent address.

transactionStatus.pendingDescription: Transaction waiting to be added to a block in the Midnight Chain
transactionStatus.confirmedDescription: Transaction has been added to a block in the Midnight Chain
transactionStatus.failedDescription: Transaction has failed to reach the chain and wallet doesn’t expect it to proceed
transactionStatus.failedToExecuteDescription: Transaction was added to blockchain but smart contract call resulted with error
transactionStatus.notPersistedDescription: This transaction is not yet persisted

transactionType.redeemDescription: A transfer transaction from a transparent address to a confidential address
transactionType.transferDescription: A fully confidential transfer of funds

message.contractDetailsApproval: I've checked the contract details to make sure the above information is correct
message.noTokensToShow: No tokens to show, click on "$t(tokens.button.addToken)" to add one
message.hideTokenMessage: You can add this token back in the future by clicking on "$t(tokens.button.addToken)".
message.contractAddressInfo: The ERC20 token contract is deployed at this address, it could be used as a safe identifier of the token

error.tokenAddressAlreadyTracked: The provided address is already in your list for the following token: {{tokenName}}
error.invalidERC20Contract: There is no valid ERC20 contract deployed at the address

message.waitUntilActionFinish: You will have to wait for your action to finish.
message.debugLogsSaved: Debug logs saved successfully! Click here to open the containing folder.
message.supportModalMessage:
If you encounter a bug, don't hesitate to contact our support team on Slack.

To make it easier for us to diagnose your problem, please, include your debug logs in thebug report.

You can save your logs easily by clicking the Export Logs button below.

error.dialogValidationFailed: Some fields require additional action before you can continue.
error.mustBeANumberLessThan: Must be a number less than {{maxValue}}
error.mustBeANumberGreaterThan: Must be a number greater than {{minValue}}
error.itMustBeAnInteger: It must be an integer value
error.atMostDecimalPlacesArePermitted: At most {{count}} decimal place is permitted
error.atMostDecimalPlacesArePermitted_plural: At most {{count}} decimal places are permitted
